Beyond Inspiration

Every great idea starts with inspiration. This inspiration finds its embodimentin the form of
our co-owner, Tikhonovskiy Yuriy.

He isn't just a co-founder of our company; he's the driving force behind itscreative energy. His
passion for art and his talent as the Creative Directorinfuse our coins with a unique visual
identity that resonates with peopleacross the globe.

Path to Creativity and Success

Under Yuriy Tikhonovskiy's guidance, our company hasevolved into a hub of innovation and imaginative solutions inthe field of coinage. His inspiring designs have become ourcompany's hallmark, and his talent for creating coins unveilsdistinctive narratives through each piece. Thanks to thisapproach, we take pride in our accomplishments and theattention we lavish on every coin

Creative Autobiography

Love for Art and the World of Coins

Yuriy Tikhonovskiy is a master of his craft, tracing his journey from the realm of art to the world of numismatics. Early yearssurrounded by colors and forms shaped his unique style and aesthetic perspective. Each coin he creates is a canvas on which heimparts a fragment of his inner world.

Through years of exploration, creativity, and a relentless pursuit of excellence, Yuriy Tikhonovskiy has not only become arecognized maestro in his field but has also propelled our company to the forefront of the coinage industry. His boundless passionfor art and unwavering confidence in his ideas make both him and our company unparalleled in the realm of coin design.

Every coin crafted by Yuriy Tikhonovskiy carries a piece of his artistry and fervor. Just as every individual holds their own story,each coin serves as a vessel of unique history and emotion, embodying the creative journey of Yuriy Tikhonovskiy and ourcompany.
